short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TOZ Flow Password Manager extension securely stores and auto-fills login information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension you can create, update, and autofill your credentials such as username, password, and TOTP (Time-based One-Time Passwords) code.

You can also access your TOZ Flow-based Vault, secure Groups, and your Launchpad shortcuts.
